3. Add Address Functionality ‚úÖ PASSED

Steps: 1. Clicked ‚ÄúAdd Address‚Äù button 2. Modal dialog appeared with form fields 3. Selected State: ‚ÄúWp Kuala Lumpur‚Äù 4. Selected City: ‚ÄúKuala Lumpur‚Äù (cascading dropdown activated) 5. Selected Postal Code: ‚Äú50000‚Äù (cascading dropdown activated) 6. Entered Address: ‚Äú123 Jalan Test Street‚Äù 7. Save button became enabled 8. Clicked ‚ÄúCancel‚Äù to close

Result: - Form validation works correctly (Save button disabled until all required fields filled) - Cascading dropdowns function properly (City enabled after State, Postal Code after City) - Cancel button closes the modal without saving - Form accepts valid input

UI/UX Notes: - Clear field labels with asterisks (*) for required fields - Good user flow with dependent dropdowns - Extensive postal code options available

Issues Found

1. 404 Error on Help Center Endpoint ‚ö†Ô∏è MEDIUM PRIORITY

Error: Failed to load resource: the server responded with a status of 404 ()

URL: https://alimas-staging-production.up.railway.app/vendor/help?_rsc=6yfje

Impact: Help Center page not accessible

Recommendation: Create Help Center page or update navigation to remove non-functional link

2. Resource Preload Warnings ‚ö†Ô∏è LOW PRIORITY

Console Warnings: - CSS files preloaded but not used within a few seconds of page load - Font files (.woff2) preloaded but delayed usage

Affected Resources: - /next/static/css/5c38cf29ec6308f6.css - /next/static/css/5b2d8f87da6b2d4f.css - /next/static/media/6245472ced48d3be-s.p.woff2 - /next/static/media/7db6c35d839a711c-s.p.woff2

Impact: Minor performance warnings, no functional impact

Recommendation: Review and optimize resource preloading strategy

3. Autocomplete Attribute Missing ‚ö†Ô∏è LOW PRIORITY

Warning: Input elements should have autocomplete attributes (suggested: ‚Äúcurrent-password‚Äù)

Location: Login form password field

Impact: Accessibility and form usability

Recommendation: Add appropriate autocomplete attributes to form inputs

4. Multiple GoTrueClient Instances ‚ö†Ô∏è LOW PRIORITY

Warning: Multiple GoTrueClient instances detected in the same browser context

Impact: Potential undefined behavior with authentication

Recommendation: Review authentication client initialization to ensure single instance

UI/UX Observations

Strengths ‚úÖ

  1. Clean, Professional Design
    • Modern interface with good spacing
    • Consistent color scheme (pink/magenta accent colors)
    • Clear visual hierarchy
  2. Intuitive Navigation
    • Sidebar menu clearly organized
    • Icons support text labels
    • Active page highlighted
  3. Responsive Elements
    • Sidebar can collapse for smaller screens
    • Buttons have hover states
    • Forms have proper validation feedback
  4. Good User Feedback
    • Success messages (clipboard copy alert)
    • Disabled states on buttons until forms valid
    • Visual feedback on button interactions
  5. Map Integration
    • Interactive Google Maps properly embedded
    • Multiple ways to view/edit location
    • Good integration with store profile

Areas for Improvement üîß

  1. Photo Gallery
    • Currently showing placeholder images
    • Could benefit from image upload progress indicators
    • Consider adding image management features (delete, reorder)
  2. Store Information
    • No address currently displayed under store name
    • Could show operating hours
    • Business description/bio area would be useful
  3. Help Center
    • Non-functional (404 error)
    • Should be fixed or removed from navigation
  4. Mobile Responsiveness
    • Should test on actual mobile devices
    • Sidebar behavior needs mobile testing

Browser Compatibility

Tested With: Playwright (Chromium-based)

Features Requiring Cross-browser Testing: - File upload dialogs - Clipboard API (Share function) - Google Maps embed - Modal dialogs

  • Page Load: Quick load time in staging environment

  • Map Loading: Google Maps loads properly but may have slight delay

Security Observations

  1. Authentication: Vendor successfully authenticated and session maintained
  2. Authorization: Proper redirect to vendor dashboard after login
  3. Data Display: Vendor-specific data (QueenSauna) correctly displayed
  4. Session Management: User dropdown shows appropriate options for vendor role

Recommendations

High Priority

  1. ‚úÖ Fix Help Center 404 error or remove from navigation
  2. ‚úÖ Implement actual Help Center page with vendor documentation

Medium Priority

  1. Add more store information fields (hours, description, contact)
  2. Implement photo management features (delete, edit, reorder)
  3. Add form for editing store name and basic info
  4. Show current address in profile (if one exists)

Low Priority

  1. Optimize resource preloading to eliminate console warnings
  2. Add autocomplete attributes to forms
  3. Review authentication client initialization
  4. Add loading states for image uploads
  5. Consider adding store analytics preview on My Store page
